metadata.title: CVE-2019-13681 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in downloads in Google Chrome prior to77.0.3865.75 allowed a remote attacker to bypass download restrictions viaa crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
